title: Game Sound
body:
The sound effects for the game were fine before this recent patch. 
But now everytime there is a smite, or the end victory and defeat sounds of the nexus blowing up, it is incredibly loud.
Ive never had this problem before and even turning my sound effects down to to a quarter is still very loud.
It's very obnoxious.
I hope you take this into consideration.

replies.body:
Hey Nataleenie,

Like KestrelGirl mentioned, there were some things that got wonky as we updated our sound engine, sorry about that. There are some ways the engine processes certain kinds of audio differently now, so we're adjusting things accordingly (but then finding out it affects other things along the way and having to adjust those as well). 

Nexus blowing up for sure was turned down - there were a couple layers of things happening that made that so super loud, but the fix should be on PBE now.
@semipriceysoap the sound of my game (announcement and champs' voice) is 2x faster than before. Is that because of the updated sound engine, too?
2x faster?! Hm... I can't say that's normal. Are you able to submit a video of this as a bug?

https://youtu.be/pnRjAc49RHc

This is the video of the bug. I tried many ways to fix it ( initial repair, uninstall- reinstall) but they don't work. It keeps 2x faster. I didn't change or edit the video. I just recorded and uploaded on youtube.

Hmm.. that's bizarre. What is your computer setup like? It sounds like this may be an audio overclocking issue, meaning sample rate of your PC and LoL are acting funky and incompatible. Do you have any special sound cards? What's your PC audio running back as?

https://imgur.com/a/CHZyy
There are some errors during the installation, I wonder if this helps. BTW, I already added the information of the sound card in the image. Can you give me further instruction on what to do next? Thank you for spending time reading these.

[](https://imgur.com/a/CHZyy)

I'm not the greatest with code/patching but I'll poke around to see if there's any info I can find for this!

As for the sound card - could you navigate to the Advanced Settings of your sound card and see what the Default Format is set to (it should give a sample rate and bit depth, maybe something like 16 bit, 44100Hz)? 

I think that would live under Properties > Playback > Advanced tab, though I actually have not used Windows 7 or 8 so I'm not sure if it lives in the same place.

I did it. The sound is normal now. That is exactly what you said. I changed to 16 bit 44100Hz.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
Hurray!!! I'm so glad it worked! I can imagine how awful that would be to play it like that, haha.
Off topic, but can you please recommend some soaps for men?  The one I usually get is wearing on me.  I don't want a cheap brand, but I'm not looking for something terribly expensive, either.

Let’s not let this conversation Dove tail into something else - we’re talking about audio here!! It Dawns on me that my summoner name may indicate otherwise but, to be Honest, I’m not the greatest person to Axe about this kind of stuff.

If you wanna be Suave…  IDK maybe L'Occitane?

So far there is no change in the stupidly loud nexus blow up. I think this would be something that would be fixed fast. I can't say the sound will blow the windows out of my house but it's not far from it.
Riot is updating the game's sound engine. It will be fucky for a few patches. They're working on solving it.
